attributes.action: Make it illegal for anybody to refer to treatment under the NHS as 'free'.
attributes.additional_details: Treatment in an NHS facility is NOT free.  It is TAXPAYER FUNDED.  To continue to refer to it as free is encouraging more and more misuse of the system.  It MUST be referred to as what it is 'TAXPAYER FUNDED' if only to bring people (including our officionados of 'free' treatment in the NHS for the population of the planet) back to planet earth for a while.
